title: Universal Software Architecture Schema Template
description: Universal template for documenting software architecture that works across any technology stack, architectural pattern, or system type. Based on proven frameworks like ARC42 and C4 Model, this schema provides a structured approach to architecture documentation using placeholders that can be adapted to monoliths, microservices, serverless, event-driven, or any other architectural style.

systemContext.description: System context and external interfaces using placeholders

solutionStrategy.description: Solution strategy and key decisions using placeholders

buildingBlocks.description: System building blocks and components using placeholders

runtimeView.description: Runtime scenarios and behavior using placeholders
